title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Shaping Science Professional Identity Through Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can select three core values (e.g., respect for life, collaboration, integrity) of science professionals (e.g., doctors, nurses), create a 3-minute video or presentation using digital storytelling tools (e.g., PowerPoint, Canva), and achieve an 80% or higher satisfaction rate in peer and instructor evaluations.
Document and share professional identity development processes through self-reflection and peer feedback
Produce content combining scientific expertise with humanistic thinking required in scientific fields
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
